title: after 14 day ban I cant connect to chat anymore
body: So i got a 14 day ban on my account, im fine with that , but it ended May 12th and i just recently got back to playing league, but everytime i log in on that account it doesnt connect to chat and I cant play games, I tried other accounts I used and they all work fine

replies.body: Hmmmmm it looks like this account is currently banned, so I'm assuming you're referencing a different account altogether. There might be something blocking the client from being able to hook up with our chat servers, so check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying close attention to how to flush your DNS and port forwarding.
it says its 14 day ban from 2 months ago, my internet is fine fix ur damn shit
